Co-authors and students

This page provides information about my co-authors and students.

- Grandpa, were you a hero in the war?
- No... but I served in a company of heroes.

 —  Sergeant Myron N. Ranney (with his grandson)
WWII veteran

Erdős number: 3

  • Paul Erdős — Marc Aron Berger — C. T. Kelley — Z.

  • Longer paths to Erdős
    Paul Erdős — Ronald L. Graham — Panos M. Pardalos — Luís Nunes Vicente — Z.
    Paul Erdős — David M. Avis — David Titley-Péloquin — Serge Gratton — Z.

Remark (initially made on Nov. 14, 2014 in Toulouse)

  • My co-authored works always published in mathematical journals always list the authors in the alphabetical order of their names.

  • If I am so lucky as to have the privilege of collaborating with you, I would like to follow this order as well.

Students

  • Sept. 2024–present, Zao Jiang, MPhil, Sun Yat-sen University

  • Sept. 2022–present, Cunxin Huang, Ph.D., The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, awardee of the Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme 2019/20 (ref. PF21-56718), co-supervised with Prof. Xiaojun Chen

  • Sept. 2021–present, Haitian Li, Ph.D., The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, co-supervised with Prof. Xiaojun Chen

  • Sept. 2019–Aug. 2022, Tom M. Ragonneau, Ph.D., The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, awardee of the Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme 2019/20 (ref. PF18-24698), co-supervised with Prof. Xiaojun Chen
